# .NET Framework

> .NET Framework documentation for Windows-only applications. Covers WPF, Windows Forms, WCF, ADO.NET, and ASP.NET. Note: For new development, use modern .NET (.NET 8+) instead. This documentation supports maintaining legacy applications.

*Topics available: 5393*

- [64-bit Applications](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/64-bit-apps.md): Get information about configuring applications on a Windows 64-bit OS, as either a native 64-bit application or under WOW64 (Windows 32-bit on Windows 64-bit).
- [Code analyzers for .NET Framework](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/code-analyzers.md): Learn how to use the analyzers in the .NET Framework Analyzers package to find and address issues in your code.
- [Developing Windows-based client applications with the .NET Framework](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/develop-client-apps.md): Develop Windows-based applications with .NET. You can use Universal Windows Platform (UWP), Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF), or Windows Forms.
- [Developing Web Applications with ASP.NET](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/develop-web-apps-with-aspnet.md): Develop web apps with ASP.NET Core, which is a redesign of ASP.NET 4.x that's cross-platform, leaner, more modular, and unified to build a web UI and web APIs.
- [.NET Framework Development Guide](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/development-guide.md): Explore the .NET development guide, which explains how to create, configure, debug, secure, and deploy your .NET apps.

## Subtopics

- [Additional class libraries and APIs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/additional-apis/llms.txt): Topics available: 156; Additional class libraries and APIs documentation and reference.
- [Programming with Application Domains and Assemblies](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/app-domains/llms.txt): Topics available: 22; Programming with Application Domains and Assemblies documentation and reference.
- [Configuring Apps by using Configuration Files](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/llms.txt): Topics available: 521; Configuring Apps by using Configuration Files documentation and reference.
- [Data and modeling](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/llms.txt): Topics available: 624; Data and modeling documentation and reference.
- [Debugging, Tracing, and Profiling](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/llms.txt): Topics available: 60; Debugging, Tracing, and Profiling documentation and reference.
- [Deploying the .NET Framework and Applications](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/deployment/llms.txt): Topics available: 16; Deploying the .NET Framework and Applications documentation and reference.
- [Get started with .NET Framework](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/get-started/llms.txt): Topics available: 4; Get started with .NET Framework documentation and reference.
- [.NET Framework installation guide](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/install/llms.txt): Topics available: 10; .NET Framework installation guide documentation and reference.
- [Interoperating with unmanaged code](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/interop/llms.txt): Topics available: 47; Interoperating with unmanaged code documentation and reference.
- [Managed Extensibility Framework (MEF)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/mef/llms.txt): Topics available: 2; Managed Extensibility Framework (MEF) documentation and reference.
- [Migration Guide to .NET Framework 4.8, 4.7, and 4.6.2](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/migration-guide/llms.txt): Topics available: 33; Migration Guide to .NET Framework 4.8, 4.7, and 4.6.2 documentation and reference.
- [Network Programming Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/llms.txt): Topics available: 40; Network Programming Docs documentation and reference.
- [.NET Framework Performance](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/performance/llms.txt): Topics available: 29; .NET Framework Performance documentation and reference.
- [Reflection And Codedom Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/llms.txt): Topics available: 11; Reflection And Codedom Docs documentation and reference.
- [Release Notes Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/release-notes/llms.txt): Topics available: 26; Release Notes Docs documentation and reference.
- [.NET Framework tools](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/tools/llms.txt): Topics available: 35; .NET Framework tools documentation and reference.
- [Microsoft UI Automation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/llms.txt): Topics available: 116; Microsoft UI Automation documentation and reference.
- [.NET Framework unmanaged API reference](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/llms.txt): Topics available: 1441; .NET Framework unmanaged API reference documentation and reference.
- [Windows Communication Foundation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/llms.txt): Topics available: 1868; Windows Communication Foundation documentation and reference.
- [What's new in .NET Framework](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/whats-new/llms.txt): Topics available: 5; What's new in .NET Framework documentation and reference.
- [Developing Windows Service Applications](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/windows-services/llms.txt): Topics available: 16; Developing Windows Service Applications documentation and reference.
- [Windows Workflow Foundation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/llms.txt): Topics available: 306; Windows Workflow Foundation documentation and reference.
